Thaumaturgy 4

Cure Disease
Ritual
N4

Cure Affliction on Others:Unknown Effect 131 (1)?
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok], No effect on Inanimate [inanimateimmune])
This ritual cures a unit from disease, an affliction that otherwise is certain to result in a quick and early death. The target unit must be in the same province as the caster.
